title: Claimed by the Thief
description: Served on a platterDaughter of one of Moscow's most powerful dons, Nadenka is a rich heiress. Everywhere she goes she catches the male eye, but only one man truly understands her desire for freedom.Konstantine has been a fixer for the dons for as long as he can remember, having worked his way up from nothing. And until now he's never let himself grow attached to anyone. Can he become powerful enough to take on Moscow's dons and claim their greatest prize?Will Nadenka be his undoing?Can she refuse the intentions of the Petrushkov don when he's already rumoured to have killed his own brother?Read the first of three books in the Thief series now to find out what happens in this deadly game of love.
author: Eliza Lockhart
